title: MRT Jakarta - SIGMA Internal Audit
details: Maintained and enhanced the internal audit application for MRT Jakarta. Implemented modern tech stack with Express TypeScript, React frontend, gRPC microservices, and MinIO cloud storage for efficient audit tracking.

title: E-Audit Mobile Application
details: Refactored and modernized legacy Android audit application to the latest Flutter version. Improved performance, user experience, and maintained API compatibility with existing backend services.

title: Waskita Karya - E-TILA
details: Customized and adapted enterprise audit management system to meet Waskita Karya's specific requirements. Implemented role-based access control, compliance tracking, and advanced reporting features.

title: SiSaku - Student Savings Management
details: Built a dynamic role-based student savings management application with modern UI/UX. Features include transaction tracking, fund management, and administrative dashboards using Laravel Livewire and Tailwind CSS.

title: ProSync - Team Project Manager
details: Created a comprehensive project and task management application designed for team collaboration. Features include task assignment, timeline tracking, progress monitoring, and team communication tools.

title: Green Royal Puri - Property Landing Page
details: Developed a high-performance, SEO-optimized property marketing landing page for Agung Sedayu Group's Green Royal Puri project. Features responsive design, image galleries, and property information systems.
